DOC.brief_summary: This prospective cohort study focus HIV negative woman . The investigator want learn follow type contraceptive method : Depot medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) , Etonogestrel impant ( Eng-Implant ) Levonorgestrel intrauterine device ( Lng-IUD ) impact vaginal immune environment
DOC.brief_title: Impact Hormonal Contraception HIV Acquisition Transmission Risk
DOC.detailed_description: The three propose aim evaluate effect three contraceptive method : Depot medroxyprogesterone acetate ( DMPA ) , Etonogestrel impant ( Eng-Implant ) Levonorgestrel intrauterine device ( Lng-IUD ) : ( 1 ) HIV target immune cell within female genital mucosa ; ( 2 ) marker T-cell activation traffic within female genital mucosa ; ( 3 ) secrete cytokine chemokines within female genital mucosa .
DOC.criteria: Female Age 1845 year Normal menses ( 2235 day interval ) least 3 cycle Intact uterus cervix Interested DMPA , EngImplant LngIUD Willing delay initiation hormonal contraception 1 month Willing use condom abstain sexual intercourse least 48 hour genital tract sampling ( condom make available ) Able willing provide inform consent , undergo serial blood CVL sample Negative HIV screen . Pregnant within last 3 month Breastfeeding History loop electrosurgical excision procedure , conization , cryosurgery within past year Use hormonal contraception IUD past 6 month , Known history medical condition would interfere conduct study Symptomatic vaginal infection genital ulcer disease screen Taking medication interact select contraceptive Contraindications select contraceptive per CDC medical eligibility criterion ( 67 ) judgment clinician .
